document.full_text: syrian forces killed 41 civilians in an effort to crush pro-democracy protests, a human rights lawyer said on wednesday, as opposition leaders met in turkey to plot the downfall of syrian president bashar al-assad.
document.title: syrian forces shell town kill 41, lawyer says
lines_and_colors: syrian forces killed 41 civilians in an effort to crush pro-democracy protests, a human rights lawyer said on wednesday, as opposition leaders met in turkey to plot the downfall of syrian president bashar al-assad.
